CustomField.description: Indicates whether data returned from api call is a list of one or more records and should therefore be displayed in a table. If not selected, it assumed that a single record form display is required.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether data returned from api call is a list of one or more records and should therefore be displayed in a table. If not selected, it assumed that a single record form display is required.
CustomField.label: Display as Table
